name: Boti Tikka Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Boti Tikka Recipe: Beef Â½ kg Lemons 3 Roasted cumin powder 1 tsp Red chili flakes 1 tbsp Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp Raw papaya paste 2 tbsp Tikka Masala 2 tbsp Oil 2 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: Wash Meat and add in 2 tbsp papaya paste, 3 tbsp lemon juice, some salt Add 2 tbsp tikka masala, 1 tbsp red chili flakes and 1 tsp roasted white cumin. Mix it and hammer them. Cook them on the grill pan. Keep on brushing oil. When cooked serve them with parathas.
